parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Remove weapon from a unit. The unit must be [[local]] to the computer where command is executed. For a global version of this command see [[removeWeaponGlobal]].

'''Note''': It is possible to create invalid combinations with this command (ie, attempting to remove a weapon that a unit does not possess). When doing so, application behaviour is undefined.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''removeWeapon''' weapon

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> weapon: [[String]] - weapon class name

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[removeWeapon]] "BAF_L85A2_RIS_SUSAT";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>An_2 [[removeWeapon]] "M240_veh";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[removeWeaponGlobal]], [[addWeapon]], [[removeAllWeapons]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 27, 2009 - 14:30 (CEST)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ZGuba|zGuba]]</dt>
<dd class="note">CTD may occur in certain conditions: when shooter is AI and is currently shooting at target in some proximity (tested with M136 on ACE 1.08 and Compact Fix 1.14H+). Even "dropweapon" action may cause CTD with AI.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
